1.content:
Let’s get started. Who exactly are you?

Lucas (18 years old): Lucas is a nice boy who lives with his mother and sister. He’s not popular in school but he does his best to help others. He likes hanging out with his best friend (who gets him into trouble at times) and visiting the park for some peace and quiet.

Albert (47 years old): Albert lives alone in a small house. He works as a janitor at a fast food restaurant. He tries to be nice but kids seem to fear him at times. He has one friend who he has only met online.

Clara (19 years old): Clara is the popular kid at school who gets all of the attention. She is also very attractive, making a lot of the boys fall in love with her. She gets good grades and likes to play soccer. Despite the attention she gets, she has never used it to manipulate others or herself. Clara lives with her parents and younger brother (who she helps whenever she can).

Kori (53 years old): Kori is a single mother with a son and a daughter. She works as a zookeeper and does her best to look after her family. When she goes to work, she calls her friend’s daughter to babysit them. Despite spending a lot of time at work, she always makes time for her kids.
1.title: Your character’s identity

11.content:
Lucas had made up his mind about what he wanted to do today. Today was the day he was going to get himself a pet. His mother had always told him no as she felt he wasn’t ready for a pet, but he felt prepared. He hadn’t told anybody else about his plan as he wanted to keep it a secret for now.

The boy entered the pet store and looked around. There were a lot of pets to choose from. Some of them were pretty big while others were fairly small. He searched carefully until he accidentally bumped into an employee.

“Oh I’m sorry.” He said. The woman turned around and smiled at him.

“Hello there! What can I do for you today.” She asked politely.

“Well, I’m looking to adopt something. I’m just not sure what.” He said. He scanned the different creatures, having no idea what to pick. The employee smiled and thought for a second.

“Well, we have many to choose from. However, perhaps I can offer you a unique type of pet.” She said. Lucas turned back to her, curious as to what she was referring to. The woman motioned him to follow her and took him to the back room.

The back room was really quiet and there weren’t any animals. However, there were a lot of eggs on the shelves with different labels. Each one seemed to be a different color.

“What kind of eggs are these?” Lucas asked. He went up to a shelf and read the label. “Anthro…bunny. What does that mean?”

“These are unique types of pets that cannot be found anywhere else. When your egg hatches, your unique pet will be born. They will always be female and start off small but incredibly intelligent, perhaps even smarter than you or me.” She explained. Lucas nodded, listening carefully.

“So what do they eat?”

“Oh pretty much anything, and I mean anything. They may even decide to eat their own species if they want. However, we have a special type of food just for them.”

The woman walked over to a cabinet and opened it up. She pulled out 3 jars and set them on the table. Lucas inspected them and noticed they looked like berries. Each jar was a different size and had different colored berries.

“These are the only things that will make your pet grow. The green berries with grow your pet by 3 inches. The yellow berries with grow them a foot taller. As for the red ones, you must be very cautious with them.” Lucas gave her a look and tilted his head.

“Why, How much does it cause them to grow?”

“5 feet.” The woman warned him. Lucas shuddered, he was 6 feet tall so one red berry would cause the creature to become almost as tall as him. After a minute of silence, the woman started smiling once more. “So, which one would you like?” She asked. Lucas looked around and carefully considered his options. After a minute, he decided to go with…

111.content:
Lucas looked over his options carefully until he noticed a label marked “human”. He hesitated before picking the egg up. It felt nice and warm, making him smile.

“Is there really a human in this egg?” He asked. The employee nodded and rubbed the egg a little. Lucas held the egg close and started to pet it. The thought of a human female inside the egg made him chuckle.

“So, how will I know when this egg is going to hatch?” He asked. The woman leaned into his ear and started to whisper.

“When you’re ready for her, just tell the egg It’s time to wake up and it’ll start hatching.” She explained. Lucas nodded and smiled at the egg once more. The boy paid the employee and put the jars in his backpack (he had taken it just in case).

“Thank you.” He said, walking out. Lucas kept a close eye on the egg as he traveled back home. He didn’t want anything to happen to it, and he certainly didn’t want his family to take it away. When he got home, he could tell his mother was in the kitchen. The boy quietly moved upstairs to his bedroom and locked the door. He placed the egg on his bed and smiled.

“Ooh, I can’t wait! I wonder what she’ll look like.” He thought to himself. He leaned in, feeling excited. “It’s time to wake up.” The egg sat quietly, making Lucas feel confused. He wondered why it didn’t react. “It’s time to wake up.” He said again. Still no response. The boy sighed, losing his excitement. He was starting to think this was just a scam.

He started to reach for the egg when it suddenly cracked. He froze, holding his breath. The crack grew and spread across the egg. The damage continued to increase until the entire thing shattered. Lucas stared in awe. On the bottom egg shell was a small adult woman curled up. After a moment, she started to move, standing to her full height.

The woman looked to be about 3 inches tall, small enough to fit in his hand. She had long ginger hair, blue eyes, and a nice figure. Lucas quickly blushed as the woman was completely naked. The tiny female started to look around, observing her surroundings.

“H-hello there.” He said. The woman looked up at him and simply stared at him. “My name is Lucas.” The woman continued to stare at him, not reacting at all. After a minute, she smiled.

“Hello there Lucas.” She replied. The boy was stunned that she could already speak. Her voice was soothing and nice. “Are you my owner?”

“Yes, I suppose I am. I want to be friends with you though and have fun.”

“Alright, I look forward to it but first, what is my name?” She asked. Lucas thought about it for a minute. He wanted her to have the perfect name.

“How about Penny?”

“Penny…how lovely. Alright then, call me Penny.” She said with a smile. Lucas lowered his hand and allowed her to step on. As he lifted her up, he continued to blush and her sexy body. “So Lucas, what would you like to do?”

The boy smiled, already equipped with an idea.
111.title: The start of a friendship

choices: Penny was hungry and wanted something to eat
Penny asked if he could find her a nice outfit to wear
Penny requested to have a berry
Lucas’s mother knocked on the door
1111.content:
“Can you tell me a bit more about yourself?” Lucas asked. Penny smiled and gave a nod. Lucas mirrored her smile and sat down on the bed, listening carefully.

“I was born with the knowledge of what I can do and how I am. It’s to help owners understand us better. I think the first thing you should know is that my body is basically invincible.” Lucas’s eyes widened.

“Really?”

“Yes. You can step on me, burn me, eat me, whatever you want and I won’t die.”

“But wont it hurt?”

“Oh yes, it would hurt a lot. However, something interesting is that after enough torture, my body will adapt. So if you continue to step on me, my body will become stronger to the point where stepping on me won’t hurt.” Penny explained.

“Cool! What else can you do?” Lucas asked, curious of the woman. He was glad his friend would be able to stay safe.

“Well, I’m pretty strong for my size. In fact, I could probably pick up a basketball if I wanted to. My strength will also increase as my size increases. As for my speed, I’m pretty fast.”

“Really? Can I see?” Lucas asked. When Penny nodded, the boy set her down on the ground. The tiny woman smiled and ran to the other side of the room. The boy stared in awe as it only took about 10 to 15 seconds. When she ran back, Lucas picked her up again. “Wow, you’re like a super human. If you were to grow to my size, you could probably take me down easily.”

Lucas started to chuckle at the idea. It was kind of amusing to think about how strong she could become. He didn’t know if that was a good thing or a bad thing. Penny smiled as well. The thought of becoming overpowered interested her. However, there was one thing pretty clear in her mind at the moment.

“I wouldn’t intentionally hurt you though. Even though we just met, you seem like a nice person.”

“Thanks.” Lucas started to pet her, making Penny feel nice.

“So Lucas, is there anything you can do?” The tiny woman asked. Lucas blushed and started to think about it.

“Well, I can play an instrument pretty well.” He said.

“May I see?” Lucas nodded and placed her on the bed before walking to his closet. Within a moment, he pulled out a silver ocarina. He sat down next to Penny and started to play it. The tiny woman smiled. The music sounded nice and peaceful. She laid against his leg and listened for a while. Lucas continue to play the ocarina for a couple of minutes. Playing the ocarina reminded him of good memories. When he finished, smiled at his friend once more. “Alright Penny, what do you want to do now?” He asked nicely. The girl thought about it for a moment.
1111.title: Abilities big and small

11113.content:
“Could I have a berry please?” Penny asked. Although she didn’t mind being small, she wanted to be bigger, even if it was only a little bit. Lucas nodded and pulled the jars out, setting them on the table. Each one looked pretty good to Penny. “Oh, by the way, there is something you should know. I can’t actually get the berries myself.” Lucas gave her a confused look.

“Wait, what do you mean?”

“I can eat the berries myself, but I can’t open the jars. If they’re already open, I can reach in and grab them but being unable to actually open them is in my blood. It’s so that I can’t grow bigger without your knowledge.” Penny explained. Lucas nodded, he hadn’t considered that. He made a mental note to start double checking the jars for later. He trusted Penny, but wasn’t sure if she could resist growing bigger by herself.

He turned towards the berries and started thinking about which one to give to her. If he were to give her a green berry, she would grow to about 6 inches, the size of a doll. He would still be able to hide her and she could get around a little easier.

If Lucas were to give Penny a yellow one, she would grow a foot taller, a bit taller than a ruler. He would have a bit more trouble hiding her, but it could make things interesting.

The boy then considered the red berries. He had been warned to be careful with then and indeed were a dangerous option. One berry would make her almost as tall as him. He would be forced to tell his mother the truth sooner that he would have liked (he would also have to hope she didn’t punish him for it). However, if Penny were his size, she could enjoy things like a normal human. There were definitely benefits to it.

Lucas nodded with a decision in mind and reached for…
11113.title: Time for a berry decision

choices: One that had a label that read “human”
14.content:
Kori smiled as she was getting ready to leave. After today, things would be quite different. After all of these years, she finally decided to get a pet. Her 15 year old son and 17 year old daughter were currently in school which gave her time to get one as a surprise.

She locked up the house and started walking towards the pet store. As the sun shined down on her, she carefully thought about what to get. She could get a fish as to start with. However, Kori wasn’t sure if the kids would be interested in it. The woman also considered getting a guinea pig, though she wasn’t sure about that option either.

It didn’t take her long to get to the store. When she entered, she eagerly scanned the different creatures. There were many wonderful options, both big and small. She stopped in front of a cat and looked at it.

“Hm…nah, cats can be cruel.” She said to herself, remembering a time when her friend’s cat scratched her. As she started to turn towards another pet, a female employee approached her.

“Well hello, can I help you?” She asked.

“Yes, I’m looking for a nice pet to take home but I haven’t decided which one to take.” Kori responded. The woman smiled at her.

“Well then if you’re interested, I have some special options in the back, if you want to check them out.” The employee said, indicating towards a door. Kori thought for a moment before deciding to see what she had in mind. She followed the employee to the back room and flinched. There was tons of eggs with labels. The woman approached one and read the label.

Centaur

“What is this place?” Kori asked.

“These eggs are very special. They contain creatures that can’t be found anywhere else. They start off small but highly intelligent. These creatures have the ability to grow very large though, potentially even bigger than you.” Kori stared at her, unsure of how to respond. The employee pulled out some jars containing weird berries that she had never seen before. “These are what help the creatures grow. With a green one, they grow 3 inches, a foot for the yellow berries, and 5 feet with the red ones. For this reason, you need to be careful. Besides these berries, the creatures will eat literally anything.”

Kori took a moment to process this. This whole idea didn’t seem logical. After all, centaurs and fairies weren’t real. Although, it made her curious. If this was true, her family could have a pet like no other.

“I have two kids so I need to know something, are they dangerous?” Kori asked. The employee stayed silent for a moment.

“Potentially. They’re strong enough to survive almost anything and once they become big enough, they’ll be stronger than humans. You shouldn’t worry though, your pet won’t harm you. At least, not on purpose.”

Kori thought for a moment before sighing. It was better than nothing and she decided she might as well go for it, even if it was just a prank. She carefully looked over her options before deciding to take…
14.title: A mother on a mission

The woman looked once more at her options before deciding to take…

Kori decided to give Amber a berry first
1444.content:
Kori thought about it for a moment before deciding to take the egg labeled “Anthro Fox”. Though she was a little bit worried it might be dangerous, the woman believed it was a safe option as long as the fox didn’t grow too big. As she grabbed it, the egg felt warm and nice in her hands.

“So how do I know when it’s going to hatch?” Kori asked. The employee smiled at her before leaning in towards her ear.

“When you’re ready, say Rise and shine little creature.” The woman answered. Kori nodded and paid for the egg and the berries, putting the food into a large bag. The woman started to walk home, not questioning what just happened. Her thoughts soon changed as she was half way home.

“You know what, hold on. Let’s see if she really was being serious.” Kori said to herself. She set the bag down and held the egg in her hands. “Rise and shine little creature.” She stated. Within a few moments, the egg started to crack a little. The damage quickly increased until the entire egg broke. Kori stared in awe at what was left.

Around the egg shells was a small humanoid fox that looked to be about 5 inches tall. Her fur was mostly orange with some white fur going up her belly and breasts. She wore no clothes but had a nice bushy tail. The fox girl stretched with a smile.

“Oh it feels good to be alive!” She proclaimed. The furry creature quickly noticed Kori and smiled. “Hello, are you my owner?” Kori wasn’t sure how to respond for a moment.

“I…um…yeah, I guess. My name is Kori and me and my family will be looking after you. What is your name?” The fox girl giggled at the question.

“That’s a silly question. I was just born so I don’t have a name. You have to think of one for me.”

“Oh, ok. Well um, how about…Amber?” Kori suggested. She still couldn’t believe she was currently holding a small furry lady in her hands, and one that was quite attractive too.

“Amber…I like it! So Kori, where are we going right now?”

Kori thought for a moment. The logical thing to do would be to head home, but she wasn’t sure she was ready to go home yet. The woman considered going somewhere quiet so they could chat for a bit. The woman was also a bit hungry and she guessed Amber was too.

Kori smiled at her new friend and decided to go…
1444.title: A mother and her fox lady

15.content: Feel free to make up your own characters. Just make sure to leave more options in case somebody else wants to create a new character
15.title: Make your own character

info.brief_description: You go to the pet store for a new pet and find something different
info.description:
You have gone through your whole life without a pet. One day, you decide to change that and nobody is going to stop you. When you enter the store, an employee offers a different kind of pet, one that grows in a different way.

Rules
No scat or watersports

No characters below the age of 15

No killing the actual creature (the creature will always be able to survive being crushed, eaten, etc.). However, your character can be hurt or killed.

Please add at least a paragraph unless it’s a choice chapter.

It can be in either 2nd person (you did this, you saw that, etc.) or 3rd person (This person did this, he then looked, etc.). Just avoid constantly switching it on one path.

No early endings

The pet will always be female.


Anything else goes
